entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023
